snippet: For the elderly, not only can even supposedly minor procedures have complications, but the cancers grow so slowly that they’re unlikely to cause problems in the patients’ remaining years.
abstract: For the elderly, not only can even supposedly minor procedures have complications, but the cancers grow so slowly that they’re unlikely to cause problems in the patients’ remaining years.

headline.main: Low-Risk Skin Cancers Often Treated Too Aggressively in Elderly, Study Finds
